N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 722.7 - Responsibilities of hospital emergency staff

State Regulations
(a) Hospital emergency staff shall
immediately implement the following protocol upon arrival of a putative sexual
assault victim: (1)
provide triage and
assessment in a timely manner; (2)
contact the sexual assault forensic examiner when the patient discloses that
she or he has been sexually assaulted; (3)
contact a rape crisis advocate at the
same time that contact is made with the sexual assault forensic
examiner; (4)
be available for
consultation and support of the SAFE Program and the sexual assault forensic
examiner; (5)
assist in obtaining
necessary tests and medications; (6)
assist in arranging referrals and
follow-up services; and
(7)
ensure
the availability of medical/surgical back up as may be needed including, but
not limited to: general surgery, obstetrics/gynecology, pediatrics, urology and
psychiatry. Notes
